类型: Color: C1* Gold Frame/Champagne LensLens Width: 65 Millimeters
评论详情: Excellent craftsmanship and I appreciated the small screwdriver keychain that came with it as well as the velvet pouch to protect the glasses from any scratches or dust.  Great clarity through the lens and fits my face perfectly.

类型: Color: C1* Gold Frame/Champagne LensLens Width: 65 Millimeters
评论详情: I love a good dupe and these are fantastic for what they are, a fun and affordable way to try styles you may never get a chance to otherwise. And style wise, these are great. The style is on point and I love the soft amber lens. Really they are light enough to even wear indoors and I love the idea that maybe someday I just migh just walk on in to the grocery store and watch the heads turn. But they are good for outdoors as well, and the fact that they even have UV protection is a bonus and something I frankly didn't expect at this price point. Now do they feel like expensive sunglasses? Not particularly. And if you put the real ones next to these I'm sure you could tell them apart. But nobody is really trying to fool anyone with these glasses, that's not the point. As I said they are purely for fun and a way to import a little bit of style and fashion fun into your life without maxing out your credit card. Love them and can't wait to wear them!

类型: Color: C1* Gold Frame/Champagne LensLens Width: 65 Millimeters
评论详情: These sunglasses have a retro vibe with their oversized look, making an excellent addition to an outfit or look. I absolutely love the oversized look, and they are also simply fantastic sunglasses. I love the elegant metallic look paired with the yellow tint. Highly recommend these!
